check_box.name: chat_full_width_check
check_box.label: Use full screen width (requires a restart)

check_box.name: disable_messages_spacing_check
check_box.tool_tip: This setting allows to display messages in the chat console without any extra spacing between each individual message. It is unavailable and ignored when the boxed messages setting is enabled.
check_box.label: Disable extra spacing between messages

check_box.name: console_box_per_message_check
check_box.tool_tip: When this setting is checked, each individual message in the chat console gets its own background box drawn, instead of a single box enclosing all the messages at once. However, this setting also forces the extra vertical spacing between messages.
check_box.label: Boxed messages

check_box.name: bubble_text_chat
check_box.label: Show chat bubbles
check_box.tool_tip: Note that enabling the bubble chat disables the chatting avatars' echo on the console

slider.name: bubble_chat_opacity
slider.label: Opacity
slider.tool_tip: Note that this setting is the same as the 'Avatar names opacity' in the 'General' preferences tab.

check_box.name: auto_focus_chat_check
check_box.label: Auto-focus chat bar & history
check_box.tool_tip: With this setting, when you emote/chat from the chat bar, the Chat History floater gets automatically focused (when already visible) and when you type a (printable) character while the (old style, see Cool features, User Interface) chat history is focused, the chat bar gets automatically focused and the character added to it.

check_box.name: close_chat_on_return_check
check_box.label: Close chat bar after hitting return

check_box.name: play_typing_animation_check
check_box.label: Play the typing animation when you type in chat
check_box.tool_tip: This setting applies only to your own avatar

check_box.name: play_typing_sound_check
check_box.label: Play the typing sound when an avatar types in chat
check_box.tool_tip: This setting applies to all avatars, including yours. Note: this is actually the same setting as the "Avatars typing in chat" one, in the Audio preferences tab.

check_box.name: show_typing_info_check
check_box.label: Show "Typing" in name bubbles when avatars type
check_box.tool_tip: This setting allows you to know whether a resident is typing or not, regardless of the fact that they disabled their typing anim. However some text clients do not send the "typing in chat" info, while a few viewers may be configured so not to send it. Note that this setting is irrelevant in bubble chat mode (for which "..." appears while a resident types).

text.name: text_box11
text.tool_tip: When you emit chat and emotes (with either the "Whisper", "Say" or "Shout" buttons) your avatar normally plays an animation (whisper anim, or "say" anim (nodding of the head), or shout anim). You may disable or change this behaviour with this setting. Disabling it entirely might be a good idea when your avatar is sitting on an object making it play a low priority animation and the whisper/say/shout anim overrides it. This setting applies to your avatar only.

radio_item.name: non_emotes
radio_item.tool_tip: Play the anim only when the text is not an emote or contains quotes

text.name: text_box9
text.tool_tip: The link shown on object names allows you to click on that name to open the 'Object information' floater, which in turn gives you the name of the owner (with a link to their profile), the object position (with a link to the map) and presents you with muting options

panel.text: Show links on chatting object names in chat history for:

check_box.name: tab_auto_complete_name_check
check_box.label: TAB auto-completes avatar names
check_box.tool_tip: When this setting is enabled, hitting the TAB key after entering the first letters of the name of an avatar within chat range causes the viewer to attempt to auto-complete that name for you.

check_box.name: select_auto_completed_part_check
check_box.label: Auto-select completion
check_box.tool_tip: When this setting is enabled, each time an avatar name is auto-completed the cursor stays in place and the added letters are auto-selected (letting you the choice between moving the cursor, thus keeping the auto-completed name as is, or to type new letters in place of the auto-completed part of the name). When this setting is disabled, the cursor is instead moved to the end of the auto-completed name.

check_box.name: swap_shout_whisper_shortcuts_check
check_box.label: Swap the shortcuts for "Shout" and "Whisper" actions
check_box.tool_tip: The normal shortcut for shouting is CTRL ENTER and the normal shortcut for whispering is SHIFT ENTER, which is pretty unnatural and unintuitive (SHIFT is used to type capital letters and typing all caps is considered 'shouting', not to mention SHifT and SHouT start and end with the same letters, while CTRL is more in relation with the self-'control' you would use for whispering). With this setting checked, the shortcuts are swapped and you can use SHIFT ENTER to shout and CTRL ENTER to whisper.
